ing: 1 cup frozen mixed vegetables (carrots, corn, peas, and string beans)
1 cup UNCLE BEN'SÂ® Flavor Infusions Chicken & Herb Rice
des: "You don't have to wait until spring to enjoy this meal with your family. It's great any time you want a flavorful and easy-to-make meal filled with the goodness of vegetables and chicken."
ins:
In a skillet, over medium-high heat, add oil and chicken.
When chicken is browned, stir in onions. Cook for about 2 more minutes.
Add mixed vegetables, UNCLE BEN'S(R) Flavor Infusions Chicken & Herb Rice, and water.
Bring to boil, then reduce to medium heat and simmer covered for 15 minutes or until water is absorbed. Enjoy!
